steps.description: This step will build a DataFrameWriter object that can be used to write a file into a dataframe

params.name: dataFrame
params.description: The DataFrame to use when creating the DataFrameWriter

params.name: options
params.description: The DataFrameWriterOptions to use when writing the DataFrame

steps.description: This step will save a DataFrame given a dataFrameWriter[Row].

params.name: dataFrameWriter
params.description: The DataFrameWriter to use when saving

steps.description: This step will save a DataFrame given a DataFrameWriterOptions object.

params.name: dataFrame
params.description: The DataFrame to save

params.name: dataFrameWriterOptions
params.description: The DataFrameWriterOptions to use for saving

steps.description: Persist a DataFrame to provided storage level.

params.name: dataFrame
params.description: The DataFrame to persist

params.name: storageLevel
params.description: The optional storage mechanism to use when persisting the DataFrame

steps.description: Unpersist a DataFrame.

params.name: dataFrame
params.description: The DataFrame to unpersist

params.name: blocking
params.description: Optional flag to indicate whether to block while unpersisting

steps.description: Repartition a DataFrame

params.name: dataFrame
params.description: The DataFrame to repartition

params.name: partitions
params.description: The number of partitions to use

params.name: rangePartition
params.description: Flag indicating whether to repartition by range. This takes precedent over the shuffle flag

params.name: shuffle
params.description: Flag indicating whether to perform a normal partition

params.name: partitionExpressions
params.description: The partition expressions to use
